about_the_game:
It's your senior year in college, and you've been a great student. You worked hard and studied harder, but graduation is almost here. Are you sure you've experienced everything that college life has to offer? Will you play it safe or take a chance? Your decisions will make all the difference.

Potential is a very adult Visual Novel where your choices help determine the outcome. As you enjoy university life, you'll encounter a variety of love interests with unique personalities who may also be interested in you. If you can manage to put together a really great semester's worth of decisions, you might even be surprised how many are interested.

Your choices shape the personality of your character.


Will you go to the library to study? or to "study"?



How about a nice, wholesome show? or somewhere off the beaten path instead?



Maybe you ARE the show! Spank or be spanked?



Or maybe, if you play your cards just right, you can have it all...

Features:

  • 12+ love interests with unique personalities
  • 6000+ unique renders and hours of gameplay
  • Highly detailed and explicit animated sequences
  • Contemporary college town setting with 20+ locations
  • All choices have the potential to affect future options and outcomes
  • Sexual content with varying levels of vanilla/kinky, depending on your choices
  • Engaging soundtrack and sound effects
  • Galleries for both scenes and images
  • Hidden items/collectibles
  • Head-pats and hand-holding (among other things...)

content_descriptors.notes: Potential contains nudity and highly explicit sexual content.  Various kinks/fetishes are represented, including consentual BDSM situations.  However, fetish content is generally avoidable if desired.

name: Potential

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Atos criminosos
Linguagem imprópria
Conteúdo sexual

short_description: Experience everything that your senior year in college has to offer. Make decisions that shape your future. Class or fun? Work or party? Have a one-night stand or cultivate a relationship? Will you play it safe or take some chances? What if you want it all? Potential is a VERY adult visual novel.
